As per  present   policy of NHAI, the user fee collection on all the section of National Highways, except BOT projects, were being under taken through Ex- servicemen Agencies sponsored by Director General of Resettlement only till the implementation of OMT concept. But now Chairman NHAI has been designated as the Competent Authority to decide the mode of departmental collection in case the performance of the selected mode is not satisfactory or there is no response to 3 particular mode_ The modes recognized as of now for user fee collection on Public Funded Projects & BOT Annuity Projects are:- (a) By engaging DGR Sponsored Agency. (b) Through Private Contractor by calling competitive bids and (c} On OMT Concept basis. The procedure of engaging the agency through DGR is already circulated vides our circulars 88 dated 15.06.2007_ 106 dated 23.09.2009 and 108 dated 14.10.2009_ In order to enter into a contract with Private Contractor through open bid system, a draf: bid document is enclosed. The blanks in the draft docunent are to be filled in by the RO/PD office. Procedure for_procurement_of Private Contractor for_User_Fee Collection: (i) The process of prccurement of Private Contractor for user fee collection by calling competitive bids is to be started with immediate effect (ii) The user fee collection through Private Contractor by calling competitive bids would be a policy of NHAI by default and in case cf failure due to any reason in procurement of the agency the second of collection through DGR will be utilized as per the procedures already laid down till the Road Section is transferred to OMT concessionaire. (iii) The bids as provided in the draft bid document will be invited by the Project Director .
